channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Cloud Gaming (guest driver), NVIDIA Cloud Gaming (Virtual GPU Manager)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Cloud Gaming (guest driver), NVIDIA Cloud Gaming (Virtual GPU Manager)

item.title: CVE-2022-34666|2024-08-03T09:15:15.868Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cloud%20gaming%20%28guest%20driver%29%2C%20nvidia%20cloud%20gaming%20%28virtual%20gpu%20manager%29
item.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer, where a local user with basic capabilities can cause a null-pointer dereference, which may lead to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2022-31607|2024-08-03T07:26:00.703Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cloud%20gaming%20%28guest%20driver%29%2C%20nvidia%20cloud%20gaming%20%28virtual%20gpu%20manager%29
item.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvidia.ko), where a local user with basic capabilities can cause improper input validation, which may lead to denial of service, escalation of privileges, data tampering, and limited information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2022-34665|2024-08-03T09:15:15.715Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cloud%20gaming%20%28guest%20driver%29%2C%20nvidia%20cloud%20gaming%20%28virtual%20gpu%20manager%29
item.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer, where a local user with basic capabilities can cause a null-pointer dereference, which may lead to denial of service.
